translated: Karate (or Karatedo, "way of the empty hand" or "Chinese hand way" according to the interpretations) is a martial art and combat sport of Japanese origin.
original: Le Karaté (ou karatedo, "voie de la main vide", ou "voie de la main de Chine" selon les interprétations), est un art martial et sport de combat d'origine japonaise.
